document_data.name: Indith Shalla
document_data.mainbody: '''Indith Shalla''' was a [[nightcloak]] of [[Shar]] that lived in the city of [[Elversult]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Beyond her devotion to Shar, Indith was a leader within the [[Cult of the Dragon]] and headed their cell in Elversult.
document_data.Relationships: She served as the high priestess to [[Hethcypressarvil]], the [[black dragon|black]] [[dracolich]] that reigned the Dragon Cultists of [[Pros]] and Elversult.
document_data.Home: She lived within [[Blacknight Manor]], located just outside the city between the [[Trader's Way]] and the [[Snake Road]].
